title: Which fish are known as true fish? - Quora

response.answer_text: If they have a backbone (inner skeletal system of bones), gills they breath through, & fins & a tail for propulsion = these are TRUE fish. (This, of course, excludes SHELLFISH, like crabs, lobsters, and shrimp as well!) And starfish! (Sorry, Patrick Star!)

Fish is a biological products in ocean arena..somany family members I mean depends on the way of Gril and tail…back bone But shrimps…lobsters…mud crab. And So many in this family.. ocan..sea..river..lake and even snow falls
